column1: [144] The next point is to consider whether the income assessed by the assessor
falls within the definition of  “supply of financial services” and if not, whether  it is
outside  the  ambit  of  the  VAT  on  Financial  Services.  In  terms  of  the  charging
section  (s.  25A  (1)),  VAT  shall  be  charged  only  on
services”  and  the following  conditions  should  prevail  to  be  chargeable  with  VAT
